EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 9.0 - EMEA/US - 2015.10.20.Email - Invit
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 9.0 - Register Now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 9.0
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Don’t forget to register for our upcoming webinar, What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 9.0!
Tricentis is happy to announce the launch of our much awaited Tosca Testsuite 9.0 during our annual conference, Accelerate 2015. Before the release however, we are offering an exclusive sneak peek of all the new features in our upcoming ‘What’s New’ Webinar. Join us as our VP of Product Management, Gerd Weishaar, and Roman Zednik, Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales Consulting, introduce and demonstrate many new features, including the:
- The Tosca Recorder: Record, create and execute test cases on a whim - Orchestrated Service Virtualization: Just one click to switch between virtualized and reality - Exploratory Testing Assistant: Capture the highlights of what you’ve explored - And much more!
Our What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 9.0 will take place on Oct. 20, 2015 starting at 4:00 pm CEST. We look forward to seeing you at our webinar!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/whats-new-in-tosca-testsuite-9-0?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/whats-new-in-tosca-testsuite-9-0?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Tue, Oct 20, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CEST 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EDT
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales Consulting Tricentis
